title: Capital Command Fundamentals
description: Understanding capital as a tool, not a gamble. Mission-oriented approach to trading.
learning_objectives: ["Understand capital preservation as priority #1","Learn position sizing fundamentals","Master the concept of risk-reward ratios"]

title: Rules of Engagement
description: Establishing your personal trading rules and discipline framework.
learning_objectives: ["Create personal trading rules","Understand why rules matter","Learn to document and follow a trading plan"]

title: Technical Reconnaissance
description: Chart patterns, indicators, and market analysis fundamentals.
learning_objectives: ["Read basic chart patterns","Understand key indicators (RSI, MACD, Volume)","Identify support and resistance levels"]

title: Risk Management Operations
description: Position sizing, stop losses, and protecting your capital.
learning_objectives: ["Calculate proper position sizes","Set appropriate stop losses","Manage overall portfolio risk"]

title: Playbook Execution
learning_objectives: ["Execute trades according to playbook rules","Document and review trades","Learn from wins and losses equally"]

title: After-Action Review
description: Systematic trade review and continuous improvement.
learning_objectives: ["Conduct thorough trade reviews","Identify patterns in your trading","Continuously refine your approach"]
